message:
SYSTEM: NicolasMayo2018.pdf: Página 55
Two implementations
Regular
▶Rules are represented in SHACL
▶Behaviour is code-based
▶Reasoning is based on a regular SPARQL engine
SHACL
▶Rules and conditions are represented in SHACL
▶Coded behaviour is generic
▶Reasoning is based on a SHACL engine
speaker: SYSTEM
